products.title: Simplicity Linen Ivory Vertical Blind
products.description: Lightly shaded and lightly flecked, this delightful simplicity linen ivory vertical blind is understated but incredibly fashionable. It has a quaint, organic look that would make a great addition to a country kitchen. Equally though, the delicate colour and neutral feel would lightly shaded and lightly flecked, this delightful simplicity linen ivory vertical blind is understated but incredibly fashionable.

products.title: Fleur Linen 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The fleur range is a selection of great vertical blinds with a lovely textured pattern. Their fleur linen vertical blind has a beautiful texture that will stand out in any room. Product id: sdb-vtb0947 fabric colour: linen material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes fleur linen 89mm vertical blind in cream.

products.title: Fleur Linen Vertical Blind
products.description: A stem with small rounded leaf design provides a subtle pattern on the soft colours available. Fleur linen vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
